title: Making the Leap in 2020 With Evan Silva and Nora Princiotti | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
As we prepare for the 2020 season, we ask who will take the leap this year. We offer up the players, coaches, and teams who will make a significant improvement this season.
Host: Kevin Clark
Guests: Nora Princiotti and Evan Silva
